channel.title: Help with Nazi Zombies

item.title: Help with Nazi Zombies
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

[size=12pt]Hey guys!
I need some help with my server. I’m thinking of making a new minigame like nazi zombies and there are a couple things I could use some help with![/size]

[size=12pt]The first thing I need to know how to do is make a menu like the one in the Fight Caves that displays the number of waves left and the amount of zombies left to kill. I think it is something like[/size]

public void hspanel() { setInterfaceWalkable(15892); sendQuest("Hide and Seek", 15894); sendQuest("Game starts in: "+PlayerHandler.hswait+"", 15895); sendQuest("Points: "+hspoints+"", 15897); sendQuest("", 15898);sendQuest("", 15899); sendQuest("", 15900);sendQuest("", 15901); sendQuest("", 15896);sendQuest("", 15902); sendQuest("", 15903);sendQuest("", 15904); sendQuest("", 15905);sendQuest("", 15906); }

(Taken from http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,447007.0.html)

But I need to know how to customize it and make it stay up until you leave.

The next thing I need to know is how to make the npc’s spawn at the different times (Like waves) and come after the player(s).

I think I have the mystery box down and everything plus I know how to makeGlobalObjects and that, but how could I make it so if you use a hammer on the barrier it gets fixed and when the zombies walk into it it gets damaged?

if (useItemID == ITEMID && atObjectID == OBJECTID) { teleportToX = XXXX; teleportToY = YYYY; sendMessage("---- YOUR MESSAGE -----"); sendMessage("---- YOUR MESSAGE 2 ---"); }
I think that would work with the barriers but I don’t know how to make them deteriorate and be repaired.

And how could I make it so that killing a zombie gives you “Zombie Points”? I was wondering if I could use the “Pk Points” from this but make them “Zombie Points”?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I don’t think I could make the guns on the walls unless I made an item on object where you used points on a walls object ID and got a weapon etc.

Thanks in advance,

  • Staticfish1

Read full topic
